name: The Keemening
description:
This was the first ever game I made. I created this in my final year of high school during an NPA  game design course.

The game was made using the visual scripting tools in Game Maker.

There are a few bugs and it isn't entirely obvious what to do all the time, but once you get the hang of it, its a fun lil game. I would recommend reading the help section before playing as the controls are set up weird.

Few of the sound assets are not my own, but the design, art and scripting is all my own work.
